item.title: By: Jon Baker
item.dc:creator: Jon Baker
item.description: Or an Anglophile spin: Just Brill

item.title: By: Baus
item.dc:creator: Baus
item.description:
Are you still looking to change your blog name?
You should take advantage of your surname and include in the name of the blog something "Brill-iant".
How about "The Brilliant Post" ? Too cute?
item.content:encoded:
Are you still looking to change your blog name?

You should take advantage of your surname and include in the name of the blog something “Brill-iant”.

How about “The Brilliant Post” ? Too cute?
